"Phantom God of Creation": "<%me>... What did you do with them?!"
"I simply returned the visitors to where they belonged. While I am grateful for their efforts, this is a matter for us. Now, all that's left is to recreate this universe."
"Is this the end? Even though we did our best... this is how it all ends?"
"I don't... want this! I haven't... finished my goal yet!"
"That's right, Hitsugi Yasaka. You still have goals to accomplish."
"Wha?!"
"What... is this noise?"
"Children of Earth. My Children. Can you hear me... my voice?"
"That voice... Mother?!"
"What?! Impurities inside of my body... when did you...?"
"Once upon a time, before this planet had a name, when the moon did not exist. A long, long, time ago."
"While most of my body became the moon, part of me became the Earth."
"I'm also a part of the Ether used for your invocation, power born from me. I am a part of you, will of the Earth."
"The God of Creation can't deny himself, can he? No matter how much you desire it, you can't get rid of me."
"Tch... A fragment of a broken star..."
"However, I am in control of this body. Noises can just be silenced at my leisure."
"First, I will get rid of these insignificant humans."
"...Aru. Can you hear my voice?"
"Yup, I can hear you, Mother. You're inside of me."
"I have no right to ask this, but would you be willing to lend me your strength, to save Hitsugi Yasaka... no, to save the Earth?"
"If I can save big sis, big bro, and everyone else... Please, use my power."
"<%me>, Xiera. Mother and I will create a connection back to Earth."
"So please... Go back to Earth once again... and save everyone and the Earth!"
"1. Of course"
"2. Leave it to me"
"...<%me>. You seem awfully confident. How will you get back there?"
"Our access has been blocked, and the coordinates for that area are highly irregular. I can't transfer you there for a while..."
"There are things that can't be solved through just your feelings... Do you have a plan?"
"1. Even so, there has to be a way"
"2. We have you, Xiera"
"...You're putting your trust in me? That's what you mean, right?"
"O-Oh! Such high words of praise!"
"I've said this from the very beginning! I'm here to provide support as <%me>'s personal navigator!"

"If that's what <%me> wants, no matter what it is,
I'll find a way to do it!"
"Think back, when Ms. Hitsugi and Ms. Kohri came to our universe."
"Through the use of PSO2, they came here from over there."
"All we need to do is reverse that!"

"I understand the principles! I've seen the real thing! Analysis is done! Connection established!
It'd be ridiculous if we couldn't do it!"
"A way to travel from here to there!"
